queries.query: large ooze creature with a dark essence that can grapple opponents
queries.variant: big ooze monster with dark essence that grapples foes

queries.query: monster that manipulates opponents and can create a portal to the Void
queries.variant: creature that controls enemies and has a portal to the Void

queries.query: dark ooze that is vulnerable to radiant damage and can climb walls
queries.variant: shadowy ooze vulnerable to light damage and able to climb surfaces

queries.query: formless creature with low AC but high HP that can pull foes into the Void
queries.variant: shapeless monster with bad armor but a lot of hit points able to draw enemies into the Void

queries.query: grappling ooze that suffers from low intelligence and can slide through narrow spaces
queries.variant: grappler ooze with poor intelligence that can move through tight gaps
